title: Independent Nigeria
creator_credit: George Sturt, Beric Knight-Simpson, Federal Film Unit and Nigeria. Federal Information Unit
brief_description: Nigeria on the eve of independence. Gives a general picture of the country, showing its progress in economic, political and social spheres. Recent developments in agriculture and industry; medical education and social services; housing and transport, are illustrated. Describes the different races, religions and customs of the people of Nigeria, and includes colourful scenes of traditional pageantry.
